To connect a new speaker,first short press the \'G\' button on your connected speaker to enter \'SHARE\' mode. \nThen long press for 3 seconds on the \'G\' button on your new speaker to enter \'PAIR\' mode
The Google Privacy Policy describes the information that Google collects during your set-up and use of Google Cast. You can modify your device’s Google Cast privacy settings, such as whether it sends usage data and crash reports to Google, after you have set up your device by accessing the device settings in this application. \nBy pressing “Accept” below, you acknowledge that you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Google Privacy Policy. \"How to Preset your favourites\" allows you to save your favourite songs and radio stations from internet in supported \'Music Services\' for easy access. \n\nNote: Saving & listening to Presets is only possible in HomeStream. How to Preset your favourites Select the desired songs and radio stations from internet in supported \'Music Services\'; Press and hold a number button on the speaker (1-3) for 3 seconds to program the preset button. Note: Repeat above steps to store additional stations. How to play the preset songs and radio stations Press the \"Source\" key to select \"WiFi\" source in HomeStream mode; Short press the Preset button (1-3) to play your favourite music. \nNote: Playlists will always start at the beginning. Note: An unstable WiFi connection may result in poor playback performance. Never ask again

Alexa Skip
Your device includes access to Alexa. Connect your Amazon account to access personalized features.
Alexa allows you to use your voice to play music and get news, sports scores, weather and more- all hands-free. All you have to do is ask Alexa
Sign in with Amazon
Showing device state change in progress, please wait.
Things to try Here are some of the many things \n you can ask Alexa To learn more and access additional features, download the Alexa App. Alexa, what\'s the weather? Alexa, play my Flash Briefing. Alexa, what are some top rated \n Indian restaurants? Alexa, set Timer for 20 mins.
Alexa, Start Dinner Time
Alexa, Call Mum
Alexa, what\'s the weather

Say Hello to \"Dinner Time\"
Introducing Family Routines. Say goodbye to online distractions on your devices.\n\nActivate a pause on devices during dinner time with a single command.
Dinner Time allows to view all devices connected to your device,pausing internet access to any device at any time of the day
Press WPS on your Router to Complete Setup.
Here’s How it Works
Dinner Time allows you to view all devices connected to your device, pausing Internet access to any device at any time of the day.
1. Select the devices you’ll want to add to Family Routine
2. Say \“Alexa Start Dinner Time\”
Select Devices for Dinner Time
\“Alexa Dinner Time\”
Say \“Alexa Start Dinner Time\” whenever you want to block the devices on the list.
You have successfully logged into your Vodafone accont.Please follow steps to link your Genie with Alexa
Click Allow to link to your\n Genie with Alexa
Enable the Dinner Time skill\n and link your account with\n Alexa
To Unlink your account at\n any time,disable the Dinner\n Time skill in the Alexa app
Your Genie account is\n linked with Alexa
You can now control\n internet access by voice
Now let\'s setup Family Routines
"Family Routines"
Setup your Super Wifi
Wired Pairing
Almost there!
Press WPS button on your \nExtender and Router to \ncomplete the pairing
Your Extender is now paired.\nFollow the next steps to activate\n Family routines and Alexa Voice.
Tip 1: Avoid Obstructions
Manual Connect
Super Wi-Fi
Press then the WPS-Button on the extender that is currently being installed.
Almost There!\n Your extender is now paired.Follow the next steps to activate Family routines and Alexa Voice.
Tip 2: Avoid Metals
Be mindful of metal objects such as waste bins or appliances.They interfere with WiFi signal in dramatic ways
Placing extenders behind dense objects such as appliances can reduce Wifi Signal range
The following guide will help you to perfectly\n position and install the Super WiFi Extender
